ComicInfo.Title: The Take; Riding Lessons; Brief Introspection;
ComicInfo.Summary:
A housemaid for a horsebreeder gets sick of the riding crop, but when she turns the tables on her employer she discovers she likes being on the giving end! Plus: public sex in an airport bathroom.
